ing: 2 fluid ounces whiskey (such as Jack Daniel'sÂ®), or to taste
1 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
1 fluid ounce cola, or to taste
des: "One of my favorites! Similar to a Long Island, but with Jack Daniel's!"
ins: Pour the whiskey, triple sec, sweet and sour mix, and cola into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled glass over ice to serve.
